alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:14PM CDT until July 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Montgomery County in south central Alabama... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Snowdoun, or 9 miles southwest of Montgomery, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Pike Road, Coosada, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Auburn University In Montgomery, Bob Woodruff Lake, Woodcrest, Maxwell Air Force Base, Snowdoun, Lagoon Park, Pintlala, Hunter, Alabama State University, Hope Hull, Dannelly Field, Eastdale Mall, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium and Pinedale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
